modName: Craftable and Enchantable Dark Brotherhood Mage Gear
summary: Do you like the look of the dark brotherhood mage gear in game but hate the terrible enchantments that come with it? Then this mod is for you. Allows the player to enchant the dark brotherhood mage robes, hood, shoes, and hand wraps with any armor based enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
Do you like the look of the dark brotherhood mage gear in game but hate the terrible enchantments that come with it? Then this mod is for you. Allows the player to enchant the dark brotherhood mage robes, hood, shoes, and hand wraps with any armor based enchantment. This mod does not replace the original dark brotherhood mage gear.

The enchantable mage gear can be found in the dresser in Astrid\'s room close to the entrance to the Falkreath sanctuary. This dresser is the one with the \"unusual gem\" on top of it.

Please download the updated version and delete the older one. I fixed the problem with the dressers. Sorry for the inconvenience. 

New!
Now you can craft the enchantable dark brotherhood mage gear at the forge. You can also improve them at the workbench. Look under main files for \"craftable and enchantable dark brotherhood mage gear\". This file adds the crafting and tempering ability. See the images for crafting recipes.

Please only download ONE main file. Don\'t download both of them.

Requirements:
I made this mod using Skyrim version 1.9.32.0.8

I hope you enjoy this mod.



[center][IMG]http://i1189.photobucket.com/albums/z431/MimiSim/othermods.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]
Become A Beggar
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36410/?

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36203

Skyrim through the eyes of a child
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32420

[/center]
author: Mimi The Alchemist
